name: Comb Nation
description:
Made for the Wanna Yam Game Jam. You're the last of the unruly hairs in a world overrun by combs and must fight them to regain the ability to be free. Works on both mobile and PC.

Mobile Controls 

Left Button - Move Left

Right Button - Move Right

Jump Button - Jump

PC Controls 

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump
